${ModID}:StylePoints.NAME: Style Points
${ModID}:StylePoints.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove your Weak. NL Add a random card from your hat's Pack into your hand.

${ModID}:LetsPlay8Ball.NAME: Let's Play 8 Ball!
${ModID}:LetsPlay8Ball.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *8 *Ball into your draw pile.
${ModID}:LetsPlay8Ball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *9 *Ball into your draw pile.

${ModID}:ZaHando.NAME: Za Hando
${ModID}:ZaHando.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust the middle card(s) of your hand.

${ModID}:LetsDraft.NAME: Let's Draft!
${ModID}:LetsDraft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card. Shuffle a copy of it into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Beacon.NAME: Beacon
${ModID}:Beacon.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card in your hand. NL Upgrade it and give it Retain.
${ModID}:Beacon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose !M! card in your hand. NL Upgrade it and give it Retain.

${ModID}:SleeveUp.NAME: Sleeve Up
${ModID}:SleeveUp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When this appears in a card reward, the cards are *Foil and gain Retain.

${ModID}:AutoBattler.NAME: Auto Battler
${ModID}:AutoBattler.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Focus. NL You play cards automatically.

${ModID}:ShiningStyle.NAME: Shining Style
${ModID}:ShiningStyle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Startup: Gain !${ModID}:m2! *Gold.

${ModID}:FinalForm.NAME: This Isn't Even My...
${ModID}:FinalForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Exhaust 1 random card. NL At the start of your next 5 turns, play and Exhaust a copy of it.
${ModID}:FinalForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL At the start of your next 5 turns, play and Exhaust a copy of it.

${ModID}:MidnightStrike.NAME: Midnight Strike
${ModID}:MidnightStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the 12th card played this combat, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.
